links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4095
example: 26 in binary is 11010, so 26 is in sequence.
prog: (PARI) a(n)=n+5*2^floor(log(n)/log(2))(Haskell)import Data.List (transpose)a004758 n = a004758_list !! (n-1)a004758_list = 6 : concat (transpose [zs, map (+ 1) zs])                   where zs = map (* 2) a004758_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 03 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
